title: Expansion Dreams
description:
If you're looking for the greatest Wrestlemania 38 preview, you've come to the right place. Harry Minihane joins for his exclusive look at the showcase of the immortals (01:49:43). Team Minihane pulled out the win on The Dozen but it wasn't without frustration and a new scandal (00:11:00). Will Smith or his team refused to leave after the Oscars incident (00:16:00). Ernie Boch Jr. is giving out 7,000 gallons of free gas tomorrow (00:29:16). We have found the exclusive provider of breakfast for the Magnolia Live Show (00:40:40). Chris is ready to move to Las Vegas if they get an expansion baseball team (01:42:10). Bruce Willis retires, calls & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
